records.location_details: Ammunition for SC Cat 3 personnel deployed to RBI Lithuania 2021 was lost during transport and later found at Copenhagen airport.
records.where_clear: Ammunition lost en route to Lithuania, found at Copenhagen airport.
records.location_text_raw: Lost ammunition of SC Cat 3 deployed to LTU; Copenhagen airport
records.uncertainty_note: Initial loss location is broad (en route to Lithuania), recovery location is specific (Copenhagen airport).
records.context_note: Ammunition for SC Cat 3 personnel deployed to RBI Lithuania 2021 was lost during transport and personnel were conducting duties without loaded weapons. The ammunition was later found at Copenhagen airport. Local authorities and Frontex staff were initially unaware of the issue.
records.evidence_quote: Lost ammunition of SC Cat 3 deployed to LTU... Lost ammunition was found finally on 21.10.2021 by the "lost and found " service at Copenhagen airport.

records.location_details: A Frontex team had a car accident with a Romanian private car outside a town in Romania while commuting.
records.where_clear: Car accident outside a town in Romania.
records.context_note: A Frontex team had a car accident with a Romanian private car outside a town in Romania while commuting. No one was injured, but the service car was severely damaged. Police and Romanian Border Police Officers provided assistance.
records.evidence_quote: On 19/10/2021 at approximately [redacted] local time, the [redacted] team, on their way to [redacted] had a car accident outside the town of [redacted] involving a Romanian private car. No one was injured in the accident.

records.location_details: An incident involving abusive and aggressive behavior by a deployed individual occurred during a patrol in Greece.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within Greece is redacted.

possible_violations.violation_name: Violation of the Frontex Code of Conduct

records.context_note: A deployed team experienced abusive and aggressive behavior from another deployed individual, suspected to be under the influence of alcohol, during a patrol in Greece. The individual was discharged, and a disciplinary investigation was initiated for a potential violation of the Frontex Code of Conduct.
records.evidence_quote: On 27/08/2021, [redacted] team contacted [redacted] and explained that during their [redacted] on 26/08/2021, they experienced abusive and aggressive behavior from the deployed [redacted] towards them, who they suspected had been under the influence of alcohol.

records.location_details: An SC Officer's service laptop and other personal items were stolen from his car, which was parked at a hospital parking lot in Greece.
records.where_clear: Car broken into at a hospital parking lot in Greece.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific city and hospital name are redacted.
records.context_note: An SC Officer's service laptop and other personal items were stolen from his car, which was parked at a hospital parking lot in Greece while he was attending to a family health issue. Greek police launched a criminal investigation, but no useful evidence was found.
records.evidence_quote: On 23.09.2021, in [redacted] Greece, between 10:00 am and 15:10, unknown perpetrators, broke into the car of an SC Officer and stole his service bag with his service laptop inside. The vehicle was parked in [redacted] General Hospital's parking lot.

records.location_details: A Frontex SCO Cat.1 officer suffered serious health problems, leading to hospitalization in Romania and subsequent repatriation by air ambulance to a hospital in their home country.
records.where_clear: SCO hospitalized in Romania, then repatriated by air ambulance to a hospital in their home country.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific hospital and repatriation country are redacted.
records.context_note: A Frontex SCO Cat.1 officer suffered serious health problems, including loss of consciousness, high fever, and inability to control a leg, leading to hospitalization in Romania and transfer to intensive care. The officer was later repatriated by air ambulance to a hospital in their home country. Insurance and medical support were provided.
records.evidence_quote: FX SCO Cat.1, [redacted] was taken to the hospital on 07/09/2021. In the morning around 07:40 SCO CAT. 1 called the coordinator of [redacted] and informed her that had serious health problems.
